ROM.Changelog:
** dotOS Changelog** ------------------- Droid On Time!
* Device Maintainers added to About dotOS... * Now enabled PA camera * QS Panel Tiles Color Tracks the color Accent * Changable by Colour Engine or Substratum Themes * Settings/About Phone/About dotOS [click dot logo] + Added Maintainers list
device specific * fixed unnesessorry stuffs which cause lags on last version * optiised for better stability * now rom should more supportive * added parameters for for support both camera * and some other fixes for bugs which i wrongly added on last build
